  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Event event)
      Search for a specific event from the events array
      Parameters:
      event - to be found in the events array
      Returns:
      index of the event in array if found, -1 otherwise

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Making the events array have a larger length through cloning

    • add

      public boolean add(Event event)
      Add an event to the events array. Make events array larger if not enough length
      Parameters:
      event - to be added
      Returns:
      true after the event is added

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Event event)
      Remove a specific event from events array
      Parameters:
      event - to be removed
      Returns:
      false if number of events is 0 or event not found in events array. True if found and shifts all elements after the removed element to the left.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Event event)
      Check if events array contain a specific event
      Parameters:
      event - to look for in events array
      Returns:
      true if found, false if not found

    • print

      public void print()
      P command: Print the events array

    • printByDate

      public void printByDate()
      PE command: Print events array in order of event date and timeslot

    • printByCampus

      public void printByCampus()
      PC command: Print events array in order of campus and building/room

    • printBytDepartment

      public void printBytDepartment()
      PD command: Print events array in order of department name
